title: My lol is moving very slow
body: Ok, so...my lol is moving very slow...like when I log in it takes me 5-6 minutes to log in...when somebody give me invites I only get the invite after 2-3 minutes...It also move in lag although my ping is very good, and my fps too...what could be the problem, mind that I have the new client

replies.body: Hrrrrmmmm yea it definitely shouldn't be taking 2-3 minutes to see your friends game invites, so it almost makes me think your network is having problems getting the information from our servers. Check out your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for anything you may need to adjust and let me know if that helps at all.
